title: 14: S2E14 – "Harrowing Hollows” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Coffeelover309, Marcus Arias, Michael Paige, and an anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about horrors in the hollows, beckoning bright-eyed entities, sinister sinkholes, and cunning cryptids. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e14
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
